title: Dave Saw the Saddest Thing Yesterday Involving Zach Dillon
description: Dave saw Zach Dillon carrying something yesterday and said it was the saddest thing he's seen in a while.  So naturally, Dave wrote a song about it.
itunes:summary: Dave saw Zach Dillon carrying something yesterday and said it was the saddest thing he's seen in a while.  So naturally, Dave wrote a song about it.
